JOB DESCRIPTION:
Chetu ,  Inc. is an 18- year old US based Information Technology Company that offers systems integration and software development services for its US based clients. The company ,  through its wholly- owned subsidiary ,  Chetu (India) Pvt. Ltd. ,  has an offshore development center (ODC) in India that provides cost- effective quality technical services. Its offshore services primarily include software development services for mid- size corporations based in the US.

Apart from the 'Best in Industry' salary ,  the position offers an opportunity to work freely in a growth- oriented environment.

Software Engineer /  Sr. Software Engineer -  Java Developer 

Job Description

-  Should have 2+ yrs experience in Java ,  J2EE technologies

-  Expertise in Advance Java ,  Struts ,  Hibernate skills

-  Good Knowledge of Servlets ,  JSP

-  Good Knowledge of ORM tools like Hibernate ,  iBatis etc

-  Have experience in IDE like Eclipse ,  NetBeans etc.

-  Good Database concepts

-  Good exposure to object oriented design patterns
